roleset.name: to house in barracks
roleset.note: BARRACK-V NOTES: Roleset based on parallel expansion of VerbNet, PropBank, and sense groupings. Framed by Claire. (from barrack.01-v)

example.name: Barracked in
example.text: The victory secured Hannibal's position in northern Italy, he barracked himself at Bologna for the remaining winter.
